name: dumbness
content:
dumbness noun [U]
(BEING STUPID)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal the fact of being stupid or not intelligent: The world he reveals makes you cringe with embarrassment at the dumbness of your fellow human beings. He was amazed by the sheer dumbness of some of his opponents' claims.
More examplesFewer examples The banks profited from the naiveness and dumbness of the population.If people are dumb, laws are there to prevent their dumbness from hurting other people.His poetry is fuelled by astonishment at the craziness, weirdness, dumbness, marvellousness, of the life he finds himself in.
